title: Lessus super pio obitu Nobilissimae Et Pientissimae Matronae Catharinae Lentken ... Dn. Danielis Clasenii, I.U.D. In Celeberrima Academia Iulia Helmsadiensi P.P. Et Facultatis Iuridicae p.t. Decani Spectabilis, Coniugis Charissimae
creator: Clasen, Catharina  Koch, Andreas  Syborg, Albrecht Friedrich  Pohlmann, Joachim  Söldner, Georg  Thoms, Johann Adam  Syborg, Alexander Christian  Clasen, Daniel
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Clasen, Catharina  Koch, Andreas  Syborg, Albrecht Friedrich  Pohlmann, Joachim  Söldner, Georg  Thoms, Johann Adam  Syborg, Alexander Christian  Clasen, Daniel: Lessus super pio obitu Nobilissimae Et Pientissimae Matronae Catharinae Lentken ... Dn. Danielis Clasenii, I.U.D. In Celeberrima Academia Iulia Helmsadiensi P.P. Et Facultatis Iuridicae p.t. Decani Spectabilis, Coniugis Charissimae  Cum Die 7. Jan., Dominica I. post Epiphan: Anno Servatoris M.DC.LXXVII. sepulchro haereditario Lentkiano, in aede D. Uldarici & Levini exstructo solemniter inferretur, oblatus ab Amicis condolentibus & lugentibus. Magdeburgi  Berlin 1677
